Text: Hello ETRG! Just wondering what's up with those tags? I just checked IMDB for MPAA rating, and there was only 1 sexscene throughout the movie, does your release contain more or what? :)

Sample A/10, V/10, according to other comment Icelandic or Viking dialogue is very limited and the remainder of the movie is in English, appears to be an excellent copy, thanks for sharing. A/10, V/10, Birdsand is wrong there are working English subs stream for the whole movie including English / Nordic / Viking speaking parts which is great for the hearing impaired. The Audio is awesome, and the video crystal clear. TheFalcon007, you are very talented, keep up the good work, you are appreciated. Thanks for sharing
